description: After working for 8 years in √âducation nationale as a school teacher, I decided to change universe and move towards Web & Mobile development.

I followed the Reacteur bootcamp during the summer of 2019, and I was then recruited there as a teacher assistant. I am now a JavaScript / React / React Native trainer. I now wish to leave the field of training to devote myself to a work oriented Web & Mobile development.
Since my training at Le Reacteur, I continue to train myself to improve my skills.
